summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2006 MERCEDES BENZ ML350.   WHEN ACCELERATING FROM A COMPLETE STOP, THE ENGINE STALLED WITHOUT WARNING.  HE WAS ABLE TO RESTART THE ENGINE AND RESUME NORMAL OPERATION.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO AN AUTHORIZED DEALER FOR INSPECTION.  THE TECHNICIAN STATED THE FAILURE WAS CONTRIBUTED TO THE TRANSMISSION WHICH REQUIRED REPLACEMENT.  THE VEHICLE HAS NOT BEEN REPAIRED FOR THE MALFUNCTION.  THE FAILURE AND CURRENT MILEAGES WERE 61,000.   UPDATED 01/20/10. *LJ  UPDATED 01/21/10.*JB
